Name: Xizhai
Village_Settlement: Xizhai village belongs to the Xilin Administrative Village 西林行政村. The village population is approximately 500 people.
Surname_Groups: The Kang 康 are the major surname group, while the Huang 黄, the Xiao 肖, the Xu 许, and the Zhuang 庄 are all minor surname groups.
Village_Temples: 1) Xizhaijing Wudanggong 西宅境武当宫 contains the altar of the Jinfushê 进福社, and was built in 19

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: ang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人. Secondary gods include Xuantian shangdi 玄天上帝, Zhanggong shengjun 张公圣君, Tiangong yuanshuai 田公元帅, and Qitian dasheng 齐天大圣. 2) Fuxingdong 福兴洞 is dedicated to Zhanggong shengjun 张公圣君. 4. Rituals: Yuanxiao processions On 1/16 the villagers take Xuantian shangdi 玄天上帝 and Zhanggong shengjun 张公圣君 on a procession through the village.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 3/3: The celebration of Xuantian shangdi 玄天上帝 is held. 7/23: The celebration of Zhanggong shengjun 张公圣君 is held. 8/5: The celebration of Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人 is held. On all of the above occasions, opera is performed for two days, and funds are raised on a per capita basis. 5. Ritual Groups There are spirit mediums 神童 in the village, who take part in the Cangkou 苍口 and other village caihua 采花 “picking flowerflames” performances (the spirit mediums undergo feats of pain by standing bare-chested in the flames of Roman candle fireworks).
